0.name: Unknown
0.desc: A device for catching wild Pokémon. It's thrown like a ball, comfortably encapsulating its target.

1.name: Poké Ball
1.desc: A high-performance ball with a higher catch rate than a standard Poké Ball.

2.name: Great Ball
2.desc: An ultra-performance ball with a higher catch rate than a Great Ball.

3.name: Ultra Ball
3.desc: A spray-type medicine that restores the HP of one Pokémon by 20 points.

4.name: Master Ball
4.desc: The best Poké Ball with the ultimate level of performance. With it, you will catch any wild Pokémon without fail.

101.name: Potion
101.desc: A spray-type medicine that restores the HP of one Pokémon by 50 points.

102.name: Super Potion
102.desc: A spray-type medicine that restores the HP of one Pokémon by 200 points.

103.name: Hyper Potion
103.desc: A spray-type medicine that completely restores all HP of a single Pokémon.

104.name: Max Potion
104.desc: A medicine that can revive fainted Pokémon. It also restores half of a fainted Pokémon's maximum HP.

201.name: Revive
201.desc: A medicine that can revive fainted Pokémon. It also restores half of a fainted Pokémon's maximum HP.

202.name: Max Revive
202.desc: A medicine that can revive fainted Pokémon. It also fully restores a fainted Pokémon's maximum HP.

301.name: Lucky Egg
301.desc: A Lucky Egg that's filled with happiness! Earns double XP for 30 minutes.

401.name: Incense
401.desc: Incense with a mysterious fragrance that lures wild Pokémon to your location for 30 minutes. Its  appearance changes when  attracting specific Pokémon.

405.name: Mystery Box
405.desc: A mysterious old box. Opening it causes a certain Pokémon to appear for a limited time.

406.name: Daily Adventure Incense
406.desc: Special Incense with a mysterious fragrance that attracts wild Pokémon to your location as you move for 15 minutes. You can receive one each day at no cost.

501.name: Lure Module
501.desc: A module that attracts Pokémon to a PokéStop for 30 minutes. The effect benefits other people nearby.

502.name: Glacial Lure Module
502.desc: A frosty Lure Module that attracts Pokémon for 30 minutes, especially ones that love the cold. It can also cause some Pokémon to evolve.

503.name: Mossy Lure Module
503.desc: A natural Lure Module that attracts Pokémon for 30 minutes, especially ones that love mossy scents. It can also cause some Pokémon to evolve.

504.name: Magnetic Lure Module
504.desc: An electronic Lure Module that attracts Pokémon for 30 minutes, especially ones that possess a magnetic field. It can also cause some Pokémon to evolve.

505.name: Rainy Lure Module
505.desc: A wet Lure Module that attracts Pokémon for 30 minutes, especially ones that love the rain. It can also cause some Pokémon to evolve.

701.name: Razz Berry
701.desc: Feed this to a Pokémon to make it easier to catch.

703.name: Nanab Berry
703.desc: Feed this to a Pokémon to calm it down, making it less erratic.

705.name: Pinap Berry
705.desc: Feed this to a Pokémon to receive more Candy when you catch it.

706.name: Golden Razz Berry
706.desc: Feed this to a Pokémon to make it much easier to catch.

708.name: Silver Pinap Berry
708.desc: Feed this to a Pokémon to receive more Candy when you catch it and make it easier to catch.

709.name: Poffin
709.desc: A special treat for your buddy!

801.name: Camera
801.desc: A device to capture photos of Pokémon. Photos can be shared with others.

901.name: Egg Incubator ∞
901.desc: A device that incubates an Egg as you walk until it's ready to hatch. Unlimited use!

902.name: Egg Incubator
902.desc: A device that incubates an Egg as you walk until it is ready to hatch. Breaks after 3 uses.

903.name: Super Incubator
903.desc: A more powerful Egg Incubator that helps Eggs hatch quickly. Breaks after 3 uses.

1101.name: Sun Stone
1101.desc: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It burns as red as the evening sun.

1102.name: Kings Rock
1102.desc: A rock that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It looks like a crown.

1103.name: Metal Coat
1103.desc: A coating that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is a special metallic film.

1104.name: Dragon Scale
1104.desc: A scale that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is very tough and inflexible.

1105.name: Upgrade
1105.desc: A transparent device that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It was produced by Silph Co.

1106.name: Sinnoh Stone
1106.desc: A special stone originally found in the Sinnoh region that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is very tough and has a beautiful sheen.

1107.name: Unova Stone
1107.desc: A rare stone that originates from the Unova region that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is known for its intertwined black-and-white appearance.

1150.name: ?????? Coin
1150.desc: A coin with a mysterious air. It seems to have originated in the Paldea region.

1201.name: Fast TM
1201.desc: This Technical Machine teaches the Pokémon a new Fast Attack.

1202.name: Charged TM
1202.desc: This Technical Machine teaches the Pokémon a new Charged Attack.

1203.name: Elite Fast TM
1203.desc: This Technical Machine lets you choose a Fast Attack to teach to a Pokémon.

1204.name: Elite Charge TM
1204.desc: This Technical Machine lets you choose a Charged Attack to teach to a Pokémon.

1301.name: Rare Candy
1301.desc: A mysterious candy. When used on a Pokémon, it turns into the Pokémon's Candy.

1302.name: Rare Candy XL
1302.desc: A mysterious candy. When used on a Pokémon, it turns into the Pokémon's Candy XL.

1401.name: Raid Pass
1401.desc: Pass to join a Raid Battle. You can get a free pass at Gyms once per day if you don't already have one.

1402.name: Premium Battle Pass
1402.desc: A Premium Battle Pass can be used to join a Raid Battle or earn premium rewards in the GO Battle League.

1403.name: EX Raid Pass
1403.desc: EX Raid Pass to join a special Raid Battle. You can use this pass only at the specified limited-time event.

1404.name: Star Piece
1404.desc: A small shard of a beautiful gem. Earns 50% more Stardust for 30 minutes.

1405.name: Gift
1405.desc: A box that you can send to a friend. Contains a variety of useful items.

1406.name: Team Medallion
1406.desc: A unique coin that enables a Trainer to change teams. It can only be purchased once per 365 days.

1408.name: Remote Raid Pass
1408.desc: A Remote Raid Pass can be used to join a Raid Battle remotely.

1501.name: Mysterious Component
1501.desc: This appears to be what Team GO Rocket uses to hack PokéStops. Does it have another use?

1502.name: Rocket Radar
1502.desc: You can use this to track down Team GO Rocket Hideouts!

1503.name: Super Rocket Radar
1503.desc: You can use this to track down Team GO Rocket Headquarters where their Boss might be!

1504.name: Shadow Shard
1504.desc: A mysterious shard that emanates shadowy energy. Collect four to combine them into a larger gem with the Shard Refiner!

1505.name: Purified Gem
1505.desc: A clear gem created by purifying and combining Shadow Shards. Use it to subdue enraged Shadow Raid Bosses.

1600.name: Ticket
1600.desc: A ticket to access special event bonuses.

1601.name: Ticket
1601.desc: A ticket to access special event bonuses.

1602.name: Ticket
1602.desc: A ticket to access special event bonuses.

1603.name: Ticket
1603.desc: A ticket to access special event bonuses.

1604.name: Ticket
1604.desc: A ticket to access special event bonuses.

1605.name: Ticket
1605.desc: A ticket to access special event bonuses.

1606.name: Ticket
1606.desc: A ticket to access special event bonuses.

1607.name: Ticket
1607.desc: A ticket to access special event bonuses.

1608.name: Ticket
1608.desc: A ticket to access special event bonuses.
